text: The Republic of Azerbaijan women's under 17 national team represents Azerbaijan in international women's under-17 team. They qualified for the 2012 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup when they hosted the tournament. ==FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup== The team has qualified in 2012 as host.FIFA U-17 HistoryFIFA U-17 Women's World Cup Year Result Matches Wins Draws* Losses GF GA 2008 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2010 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2012 Group stage 3 0 0 3 0 16 2014 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2016 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2018 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2022 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2024 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2025 TBD TBD TBD TBD TBD TBD TBD Total 1/9 3 0 0 3 0 16 ==References== Category:National under-17 football teams Category:National sports teams of Azerbaijan Category:Football in Azerbaijan
